metadata.title: Champion Men's Pullover Eco Fleece Hoodie
features: 80% Cotton, 20% Polyester; Oxford Grey: 75% Cotton, 25% Polyester; Granite Heather: 52% Cotton, 48% Polyester
9.3 oz. heavyweight fleece helps block out cold and chill
Brushed lining for warmth and softness
Pullover Hoodie with drawstring for adjustability
description: Champion Eco Fleece Pullover Hoodie is made of a super soft recycled fiber-This fleece Hoodie is a winning combination The below colors have different fabric types. Black, Maroon, Navy, White, Surf The Web, Stadium Blue, Crimson, Military Green, , - 80% Cotton / 20% Polyester Oxford Gray, Oxford Gray/black, Navy/oxford Gray, Petroleum Blue - 75% Cotton / 25% Polyester Polyester Granite Heather 52% Cotton / 48% Polyester
